src_original: (pp. 142-144): Pell. sogdien 16:  Prajñāpāramitāhṛdayasūtra;  Faks. in E. Benveniste,  Codices Sogdiani,  Monumenta Linguarum Asiae Majoris 3, Copenhagen 1940
1 ḥ athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisatvo gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caryāṃ caramāno  2 vyavalokayati sma paṃcaskandhān svabhāvaśūnyān paśyanti sma
tgt_original: 觀自在菩薩行深般若波羅蜜多時，照見五 蘊皆空，度一切苦厄。

src_original: 3 iti / iha śāriputra rūpaṃ śūnyatā śūnyataiva rūpaṃ /  śāriputra sarvadharmāḥ śūnyatālakṣaṇānutpannā
tgt_original: 「舍利子！ 色不異空，空不異色，色即是空，空即是色；

src_original: 7 saṃpūrṇāḥ / tasmāc chūnyatāyāṃ na rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā
tgt_original: 是故，空中無色，無受、想、行、識；

src_original: 8 na vijñānaṃ na cakṣur na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvā na kāyo na mano
na caksurdhātur na rūpadhātuḥ /  10 yāvan na manovijñānadhātuḥ /

tgt_original: 無無明亦無無明盡，乃至無老死亦無老死盡；

src_original: 11 na duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgā na jñānaṃ na prāptiś
tgt_original: 無苦、集、滅、道； 無智，亦無得。

src_original: 12 ca tasmād aprāptitvād bodhisatvaprajñāpāramitāṃ niśṛtya  13 viharati cittāvaraṇaḥ /
tgt_original: 「以無所得故，菩提薩埵依般若波羅蜜多故，心無罣礙；
無罣礙故，無有恐怖，遠離顛倒夢想，究竟涅槃。

src_original: tryadhvavyavasthitāḥ sarvabuddhāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ  15 niśṛtyānuttarasamyaksaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhāḥ / tasmāj
tgt_original: 三世諸佛依般若波羅蜜多故，得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
